outputs.output_descr: The main thrust of this project is to provide consolidated UN support to the evolution of national development plans and processes. Also, it is to provide substantive inputs to development initiatives in the country. This support is articulated through strengthening delivering as one, joint programming, support to gender mainstreaming, rights-based approach, and HIV/AID, support in simplifying and harmonizing such common services as harmonized approach to cash transfer, travel, health etc. It also covers the joint communication/advocacy effort.

project_descr: UN Coordination for strengthened joint UN results and enhanced coherence.
